Package org.ejbca.core.model.approval

Class ApprovalRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ejbca.core.model.approval.ApprovalRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Externalizable, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActivateCATokenApprovalRequest, AddEndEntityApprovalRequest, ChangeStatusEndEntityApprovalRequest, EditEndEntityApprovalRequest, GenerateTokenApprovalRequest, KeyRecoveryApprovalRequest, RevocationApprovalRequest, ViewHardTokenDataApprovalRequest
    public abstract class ApprovalRequest
extends Object
implements Externalizable
    Abstract Base class representing one approval request created when an administrator performs an action that requires an approval. Contains information like: Admin that performs the request Data necessary to display the request to the approver Eventual data necessary to execute the request.
    Version:
    $Id: ApprovalRequest.java 25898 2017-05-24 15:59:21Z mikekushner $
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      static int REQ_APPROVAL_VIEW_HARD_TOKEN
      Constants indicating approval settings for viewing hard token through WS
      static int REQUESTTYPE_COMPARING
      Comparing request type means that the approving administrator have to compare old data with new data in the request.
      static int REQUESTTYPE_SIMPLE
      Simple request type means that the approver will only see new data about the action and will not compare it to old data

    • Constructor Detail

      • ApprovalRequest

        protected ApprovalRequest​(AuthenticationToken requestAdmin,
                          String requestSignature,
                          int approvalRequestType,
                          int cAId,
                          int endEntityProfileId,
                          ApprovalProfile approvalProfile)
        Main constructor of an approval request for standard one step approval request.
        Parameters:
        requestAdmin - the certificate of the requesting admit
        requestSignature - signature of the requester (OPTIONAL, for future use)
        approvalRequestType - one of TYPE_ constants
        approvalProfile - Profile
        cAId - the related cAId of the request that the approver must be authorized to or ApprovalDataVO.ANY_CA in applicable to any ca
        endEntityProfileId - the related profile id that the approver must be authorized to or ApprovalDataVO.ANY_ENDENTITYPROFILE if applicable to any end entity profile

      • ApprovalRequest

        protected ApprovalRequest​(AuthenticationToken requestAdmin,
                          String requestSignature,
                          int approvalRequestType,
                          int cAId,
                          int endEntityProfileId,
                          int numberOfSteps,
                          ApprovalProfile approvalProfile)
        Main constructor of an approval request.
        Parameters:
        requestAdmin - the certificate of the requesting admin
        requestSignature - signature of the requester (OPTIONAL, for future use)
        approvalRequestType - one of TYPE_ constants
        cAId - the related cAId of the request that the approver must be authorized to or ApprovalDataVO.ANY_CA in applicable to any ca
        endEntityProfileId - the related profile id that the approver must be authorized to or ApprovalDataVO.ANY_ENDENTITYPROFILE if applicable to any end entity profile
        numberOfSteps - that this type approval request supports.
        approvalProfile - Profile

    • Method Detail

      • isExecutable

        public abstract boolean isExecutable()
        Should return true if the request if of the type that should be executed by the last approver.
        Returns:
        False if the request admin should do a polling action to try again.

      • execute

        public abstract void execute()
                      throws ApprovalRequestExecutionException
        A main function of the ApprovalRequest, the execute() method is run when all required approvals have been made. execute should perform the action or nothing if the requesting admin is supposed to try his action again.
        Throws:
        ApprovalRequestExecutionException - on fail

      • generateApprovalId

        public abstract int generateApprovalId()
        Generate an approval hash (called ID which is confusing since there is a unique requestID as well) for this type of approval, the same request i.e the same admin want's to do the same thing twice should result in the same approval hash. This is the value that will be stored in the ApprovalData.approvalId column. This hash is not used to identify a specific request, but is used to be able to compare to requests if they are for the same thing. As an example trying to add the exact same user twice will result in the same approval hash so it is possible to find an already existing request for adding this user.
        Returns:
        a hash code for the action the request is for, should be the same code every time the same action is performed.

      • getNewRequestDataAsText

        public abstract List<ApprovalDataText> getNewRequestDataAsText​(AuthenticationToken admin)
        This method should return the request data in text representation. This text is presented for the approving administrator in order for him to make a decision about the request. The AddEndEntityApprovalRequest and EditEndEntityApprovalRequest classes have a more detailed overloaded version, that performs database queries to fill in the CA and profile names, etc. Should return a List of ApprovalDataText, one for each row
        Parameters:
        admin - Token
        Returns:
        a List of ApprovalDataText

      • getOldRequestDataAsText

        public abstract List<ApprovalDataText> getOldRequestDataAsText​(AuthenticationToken admin)
        This method should return the original request data in text representation. Should only be implemented by TYPE_COMPARING ApprovalRequests. TYPE_SIMPLE requests should return null; This text is presented for the approving administrator for him to compare of what will be done. Should return a List of ApprovalDataText, one for each row
        Parameters:
        admin - Token
        Returns:
        a List of ApprovalDataText

      • isAllowedTransition

        public boolean isAllowedTransition()
        This method is used to check if this is an allowed transition between two states, so that it does not require approval. Override this method to add allowed transitions.
        Returns:
        true if this transition does not require approval, false by default.

      • getRequestValidity

        public long getRequestValidity()
        Should return the time in millisecond that the request should be valid or Long.MAX_VALUE if it should never expire Default if will return the value defined in the ejbca.properties
        Returns:
        long

        Returns:
        long

      • getRequestAdminCert

        public Certificate getRequestAdminCert()
        Returns the certificate of the request admin, if there is any. Walks through credentials of the request admins AuthenticationToken and returns the first certifciate encountered.
        Returns:
        returns Certificate or null

        Parameters:

        Returns:
